website_summaries.verdict: The best way to keep your furry friend warm and dry in the cool winter months.
pros: Soft fleece hoodie is available in a variety of colors and sizes
Pullover design  slips on and off easily
Thick, durable material keeps dogs warm and dry
Easily attach your dog’s leash to the metal loops on the back
Color doesn't fade even after multiple washes
cons: Sweaters run small, consider ordering a size up

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my 27lb Boston , I ordered an XL :)
customer_reviews.author: Mae Bruno

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size small fits very well on my 7-8 pound Yorkie, and looks really nice. Great quality especially for the price. Durability seems good. Machine washed without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, for comfortably on our dog
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, for comfortably on our dog. We ordered a size large for our 19 lb pug and it fit very well as pictured. Pay attention to the sizing measurements, they were accurate for our order. It is a little long on his back, but considering he is a broad dog anything smaller would ha e been too snug. He loves it! It will defitely keep him warm through our snowy Michigan winter. :)
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wiechmann

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 for our multi-sized small dogs. Chihuahua & Pom/Chin mix (blue and pink) = sz Med, Papillon & Boston Terrier (red and yellow) = sz Large, Pug (green) = sz X-large. Easy on/ off, as the vests are plenty stretchy. Like the bright colors - makes it easy to see each dog when I run the pack in the back field.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made, but really runs small ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and well made, but really runs small. I bought this in a Medium, for our 10 lb Chihuahua/Jack Russell mix, because I wanted it to be a bit loose. It turned out to fit closer to her body than I'd wanted. But I decided to keep it since she still looked stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McM

customer_reviews.title: Sizing listed is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering, please know the size we ordered was listed as fitting a chest circumference of 15”. Upon arrival, the garment was approximately large enough for an 18.5” chest. We returned it for a smaller size. The hoodie is single-layered fleece with no lining. The leash attachment is a leather type piece, sewn to the fleece, with a metal D-ring attachement for the leash. The garment is long enough to reach fully to the base of the tail and the arm holes are not restrictive. This was purchased for a long haired, double coat chihuahua approx 9 lbs with a 15.75” chest using a sewing measuring tape.
customer_reviews.author: Possum QueenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very good VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of this company's dog fleece jackets over the years in various colors, with and without the hoodie. They are an outstanding value. The jackets are a thick variety of fleece and stand up quite well to repeated washings. Pilling is minimal. I have found that over time when dried repeatedly at higher heat settings contrary to what should be used on synthetics, that some shrinking occurs. I have never had any of them tear nor had a seam come undone. They are perfect around the house, vehicle and yard. However, in the thorny desert, they collect allot of plant debris. Bottom line, they are highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Last Days Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Order up 2 sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a XL because I read other reviews about it. I’m glad I did, we have a lab mix who is about 30-35lbs. She fits almost perfectly in this. It’s just a little short. I thought it would be hard to get on and off of her since yobhave to put her legs through but it actually was quiet easy. Love the fleece and so does our pup! Love the color (we are the dark purple one) my husband and I joke about it because she looks like a punk when she in it. I don’t have a photo of her in it but I’ll post a photo of her for size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Your dogs will know You Love Them if you get them this sweater...
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is perfect for short haired dogs. They actually don't mind going out in the cold with it on. The hood actually works with my Boston Terriers and they don't mind wearing it if it's sprinkleing outside. If your dog is big chested like mine you should propably consider a size up. My Bostons are fully grown and the Large sweaters just barely fit them comfortably so I definetely have to hand wash them so they don't shrink. They are perfect though; easy on, easy off. I almost forgot the best part...they don't get pee on them when they go! :)
customer_reviews.author: TSP

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Boston perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our 8 month old Boston terrier pup that is tall, long, and about 16lbs but on the thinner side. She currently wears a Gooby harness in size medium (14.5-16.5 in chest) so I opted for a large sweater since it landed in the middle of her harness measurements. The sweater is on the looser side which is perfect since our girl is still growing. The sweater goes all the way from hoodie to tail which is awesome though it is a tad long for her because she has a 3in tail. I will be ordering other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice and As Described
customer_reviews.text: I bought a green hoodie for my miniature Dachshund, Zander. The fit was a little snug because he's plump but he looked adorable. The fleece sweater is good quality, really cute, and functional. Unfortunately, he wriggles out of it easily. His smooth coat is slick and his front legs are really short so he pulls them out and into the neck hole without much effort. I'll keep putting it on him though.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall and winter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fall and winter. Better to order this fleece slightly larger to get over your dog's body since there are no zippers. I have not tested the harness ring on the back to see if this jacket will hold up to leash tugging. Bought the plum XL for a 17-18 pound Jack Russell and the Green in MED for a 6-7 pound Dachshund puppy.
customer_reviews.author: LEM

customer_reviews.title: This sweater is so adorable, very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is so adorable, very happy with the quality. I would agree with what everyone says though to be very careful with the sizing. I have a 15 lb Corgi/Chihuahua mix and the large fit her perfect (not too snug, easy to get on and off). I didn't go off the measurements, I went off the great reviews everyone else left and gave it my best guess and thankfully it worked out. Since she is a longer dog, the sweater was not too long on her, but I can see how that may be an issue for a shorter proportioned breed.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet34Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bostons
customer_reviews.text: We've ordered several of these for our boston terrier (pictured with our crazy lab). Our boston is a stout little man coming in at 20lbs. Now that he is all grown up he fits into the size large with ease. It is not tight but conforming, which is great so it doesn't choke him around his neck. The fleece is also a good quality with no piling. The latch on the back-end is really convenient and has stood up to pulling and general nonsense of having a hyper dog on a leash. Will buy more of these if and when the lil dude manages to destroy the current ones we own.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Cute but prepare for a wrestling match!
customer_reviews.text: PROS This is a snug fit for my 7 pound boston terrier puppy which is an appropriate fit to keep her warm. Fleece is good quality. Purple shade is nice. The harness loop is super convenient as a harness and a jacket is a bit more work then necessary for a small pup. CONS The product lives up to my expectations however it is not my favorite doggie hoodie. - the snug fit makes it a little bit of a wrestling match with her to get it on and off. Also the hood is adorable but slightly annoying to her. Thats why my other purchase, the Gooby Fleece (no hood) is my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love their fleeces
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my 5lb female chihuahua mix in (S) and one for my 15lb male terrier mix in (L). They fit perfectly, and I am SO happy with this product! Its really high quality and the ring on the back is sewn on really well. I've read other reviews where there were concerns about male dogs peeing on it, but I can assure you that is not a problem. The cut is far enough back that there is enough room. The only breed I can see utilizing the hood is one with a round head, like a pug, but it's still cute, and warm, of course. Anyway, really, really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenapher Henslee

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is cute and warm. My little girl is a Chiweenie (about 8lbs) and finding things that fit her chest and comfortably accommodate her shorter legs can be tricky. This hoodie is one of the good ones! Her legs never get caught up in the "sleeve" area because it fits snugly. Plus, we love the sewn in leash loop and it washes well too. All around great vest, and adorable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bidnes

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pup with a bigger chest size up! The hoodie itself is beautiful and the color is beautiful ( we got the plum) . It’s amazingly soft and comfy. The only bad thing is if your pup is bigger in the chest like mine the inseams are protruding so much it will rub into the skin. I can’t fault the brand as my dog is a buff little dude and I had no idea it would do that. Nothing mama can’t handle but please size up! I will be returning for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously oversized hood
customer_reviews.text: Quality fleece and mostly well made. Sadly, my little mix dog has “weird” dimensions so I had to order a large (her neck is skinnier than the large size neck, but her chest is right at the 15-ish mark, and perfect length). My biggest problem with this thing is the hood. I was expecting a smaller hood that could somewhat surround the neck area. Even if I tuck this thing it flips around and get a little dangerous so we won’t be using this as a liner for her hiking coat. The hood is the EXACT same length as the hoodie. Something is not right here?
customer_reviews.author: TheOrdinaryHiker

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft, perfect fit for my boxer puppy!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and cute and it fit my puppy like it was made for her! Score! Didn't last long because she's growing so fast but as soon as it started getting too tight we ordered the next size up because we loved it so much! Perfect fit for a boxer puppy! It isn't super thick, but we live in Southern California so it's perfect for us because it gets chilly here but not cold enough for her to need a really thick warm sweater. Just to warm her up a little bit since her fur is so short. And for fashion purposes of course!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sweater for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sweater for my dog for a trip to Denver in the winter. It was snowing & cold. It worked great & kept her very warm. I love that there is a leash attachment right on the sweater so I didnt have to put her harness on over the sweater to walk her. Just attach the leash. I also loved the plum color which you dont always see for dogs. I will be buying her the same sweater in different colors for sure! Great price, good quality. My little furry girl is 1/2 maltese, 1/2 lhasa apso & I ordered her a med & it fit just right. She is 14lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my baby warm!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as shown. It fits great and she loves it. Keeps my little one warm. The size chart they have is true to size. My dog that usually wears a small,wears a medium in this but they had the right listings on their size chart so I bought the correct size. It's exactly as shown. It fits great and she loves it. Keeps my little one warm. The size chart they have is true to size. My dog that usually wears a small,wears a medium in this but they had the right listings on their size chart so I bought the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after a quick modification!
customer_reviews.text: This fleece is adorable! We took our chihuahua mix north for the holidays and needed a jacket to keep him warm. This was so cute and functional! It was a little too tight around his chest, so I ended up cutting the side and attaching velcro straps in order to make it a little looser and to make putting on/taking off significantly easier. After this easy modification the fleece was perfect! Rocky looks adorable with his fleece on, especially with the hood up. Let me add though, the hood will probably cover your dog's eyes! Rocky is blind, so this doesn't matter for him at all, but for most dogs the hood might be annoying/not useful.
customer_reviews.author: m.c.

customer_reviews.title: I got it in gray and he looks super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater. Arrived on time. My dog seems cozy in it. I gave it four stars because I had such a hard time figuring out the proper sizing. I have a 13 pound jackchi and based on other reviews I got the large. I should've went with the medium! I'll wash it and with any luck it will shrink a little. I got it in gray and he looks super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jspain

customer_reviews.title: The perfect hooded sweater (pay attention to size!)
customer_reviews.text: This is the everyday sweater for my toy poodle I’ve been looking for. I was given the name of this sweater by another dog owner, who warned me to get an L or XL for my dog because these run small. Naturally, I’d the a small poodle would need a S or M, but my dog is 12lb and fits perfect in the L. I highly recommend this sweater, especially at this competitive price!
customer_reviews.author: Mikah J

customer_reviews.title: adorable hoodie for your best friend
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived so quick. The material is soft and warm. My boston terrier is a big bone boy, he weights 31 pounds and I order him the XL. It's a bit snug on him just because he is a big boy but no problem getting it on and off. I order the green color which I love on him. really good quality and can't beat the price. I recommend to anyone who wants to keep their friend warm and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: honeyb

customer_reviews.title: Cute for my 9 pound chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: A pretty cute sweater for my newly rescued chihuahua. She seems to get cold easily and does not enjoy cold floors, so I got this sweater for her. I really like that there is a part on the sweater that I can attach a leash to- not many dog clothes have this! I also enjoy that there are no sleeves, since she doesn't really like feeling constricted, so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it on my 48# Ridgeback/Vizsla X. Fits perfectly and has stood up in all coniditions including a couple wrestling matches and the washer and dryer that followed.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, just be sure to go by the size chart
customer_reviews.text: This brand runs small, so I had to size up to a medium for my 7-pound Yorkie. She is slim and long, with a 13" chest and 12" back. The fabric is soft and warm. The hood doesn't stay on the head well but looks adorable off the head too.
customer_reviews.author: Jet Set Girl

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: So I did a dumb thing and shaved my cocker spaniel in the dead of winter. Poor guy was shivering all the time. I bought this little sweater thinking I’d put it on him for walks and such. Well he doesn’t seem to mind it at all. It’s easy to put on and take off and it’s so soft that it doesn’t chaif under his legs. Definitely would recommend this for your less furry furry friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9lb chiweenie and the medium fits him best. I tried the small but the chest was way too tight to get his arms through the holes. The medium is a little looser on him and keeps him warm in 35-50 degree weather. It’s also comfortable enough to leave it on him when he’s inside. My only complaint with having to go larger to accommodate his chest is that it’s a little too long and sometimes he pees on the edge of the fabric in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Giesy

customer_reviews.title: Great Doggie Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off. Glad I listened to others and got X-large for my medium size dog and it is still just a bit short from head to tail. It is a little awkward for him to pee-pee but he got used to it. I got the grey and he just looks cool in it.
customer_reviews.author: mimi2008

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Boston Terrier
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Medium in Black for our 27lb Boston, which was too big although he can still wear it. Size Small in Blue was perfect fit on him. Warm and soft, easy to throw in the wash. Our little guy is a puller and we have used the leash directly on the attached loop and it hasn’t torn at all, it does stretch the coat out though until it is washed and dried again. Love this coat and we will buy in additional colors.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft, but quite static-y
customer_reviews.text: Our 22-lb goldendoodle recently got shaved and needed a daily outfit to keep him from freezing in the New England winter. This soft hoodie fit the bill really well and covered his back. Our pup has a long torso and short legs, so this outfit was perfect. We ordered a size large, but freshly shaven, he probably should have been a medium. However, when he grows out his locks, the large will fit perfectly. When it gets dirty, we simply toss it in the washing machine. The only downsides are the static (not super fancy fleece) and you'll have to stretch out the fabric to get those arms through. Our dog hates that part! Follow Charlie on Insta @CharliebearMe
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tsao

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL for my 23lb dog and it's a perfect fit. These run small and seem to be intended only for the smaller breeds. The hoodie seems well constructed and moderately thick. I haven't washed it yet so can't comment there. For the price this is a great little pup hoodie. About to order a second to help my dixie dog get through chilly northern winters!
customer_reviews.author: H Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy, inexpensive, in conservatively cute
customer_reviews.text: There's a bit of a difference between sizes but they are otherwise perfect for both of our Boston terriers and they are pretty inexpensive, so great especially if you have a growing puppy during colder months. They also seem to last because we haven t had to replace any foe any reason but outgrowing smaller sizes as they've grown, and we've had some for a few years. It doesn't hurt that they are so ply cute, not "froofy" bs people sometimes dress up their small dogs in. I estimate we have maybe 8-10 of them (although maybe we've gone a bit overboard).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Collum

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much that I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the size large for my 15 pound dachshund. He is always chilly and has anxiety shivers most of the time. HE LOVES THIS THING. He refuses to let me take it off of him at bedtime. I have to chase him around the house to take it off. I purchased a second color because he loves it so much. Its snug and it makes him feel secure and warm enough that he doesn't shiver. I love that it has leg holes instead of actual sleeves. It makes it actually usable and comfortable for the dog. Probably not feasible for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jo Riley

customer_reviews.title: Small = Perfect Fit For <10 lb. Dog
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these for my dogs during the winter months. The small fits my <10 lb. chihuahua-pug and medium fits my <20 lb. chihuahua-terrier. I tried an extra small once, and it was WAY too small to fit either dog; I was honestly surprised at the difference between a small and x-small.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: the arm holes...
customer_reviews.text: The arm holes were way too rigid. I could tell it was going to cause chafing, so I sent it back before it had the chance to do some real damage. It was too long, but not wide enough for my dude. He is an unusual size, so I blame him haha. Cute and soft though!
customer_reviews.author: Sydster

customer_reviews.title: Love this hoodie for my french bulldog!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s so cute! It fits my dog perfectly—usually he scratches and bites clothes or harnesses that i put on him, but this I’ve been able to just keep on him for the day, to keep him warm! That makes is so much easier than chasing him around with a harness to go out for walks. He is a 30 lb French bulldog and I got him a size Large. It’s snug, but I don’t think a size up would be better. I have a stout 33 lb frenchie that will be getting an XL, because he’s more muscular in the shoulders. But I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steph Smith

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese looks adorable in this and it’s perfect for cool weather. His hair is groomed short at the moment so this helps keep him comfortable. We get tons of compliments when he wears it! TIP: Follow the size measurements. I measured but ordered one size up & that was a mistake. It’s too long on the underside as a result and he gets urine on it. I will definitely order a size small next time.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: XL fits my 22# girl well.
customer_reviews.text: The XL fits my 22 pound leggy thin greyhound mix very well. She is leggy and thin and long with a deep chest. It covers her long body nicely but may be too long for stouter breeds. Easy to put on. The "purple" color is a pinkish-purple or magenta, not the mid purple shown in the photo. Still a very good buy. Seems comfortable and should be easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea D.

customer_reviews.title: It fits.
customer_reviews.text: It fits. Our Chihuahua is large for the breed. He's 12.5" length (from base of neck to base of tail). 12" neck and 18" chest. He weighs about 12 pounds. The hoodie bunched up around his neck adds warmth to his neck. Or it's easy to pull up over his head. The leash rings are handy. The vest acts as a halter. The fit is a little loose. I thought that might be a problem when he lifts his leg. But, no. All is good. Keeps him warm and looks good on him. We purchased size Large.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMALL DOGS ONLY
customer_reviews.text: While we measured our dog for this hoodie, the description is not forthcoming. If you have a dog larger than a Terrier this hoodie probably won't fit. The quality is good and the material will keep your furbaby warm. Shipping with Prime came in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had fit...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and well made. If it had been larger, it would have been great but the XL was too small for my 22# Corgi mix. The description - "a large will fit a 35# dog" is flat our wrong. I am returning for refund, but wish the company would create larger sizes as the design and quality of the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: pat g.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - but sizing guide is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT follow the sizing guide. Bought two for our miniature pinschers and their chests measure just under 17”. Sizing guide said that they’d need a large/XL. I bought the medium because that’s what breed they have recommended next to the medium sizing. I could literally fit both dogs in one medium sweater. The sweater felt warm, soft and sturdy though. I am going to return and repurchase a smaller size because it did seem like nice quality- they just need to adjust the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered several of these jackets for my pup. Hooded and non hooded. They’re phenomenal quality, especially for the price. My most recent one came without the leash ring (a defect I assume). A replacement was shipped as soon as I notified amazon!!! These wash up extremely well and are lightweight. I will be a customer as long as they’re manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Ccr52

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and look nice
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and the dogs seem comfortable in them. I bought two large vests for my 16 lb dachshunds and they fit perfectly. The olive color is always more expensive than the other colors and I have no idea why...maybe it's more popular. I purchased the plum and olive and am very happy with them. I also have a couple of these without the hoods and am equally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my deep-chested rat terrier mix
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Gooby fleece hoodie that I've bought my dog. The only reason we had to get a new one is that she outgrew hers from last year. These fit perfectly and are cute and stylish. They are also really easy to just throw in the washing machine and clean. The colors are cute and the little leash attachment is nice. We have loved everything we've bought from Gooby because they always fit just right and are made with great quality material.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: best ever...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the gooby fleeces, we bought one last year and have washed and dried it several times and still have no issues with it. I just bought more for our new dog. They are very well made, and extremely durable. My dog runs through bushes, and rolls in mud constantly and usually tears apart any clothing we've bought her, these are made to last, and easy to put on, no velcro to deal with. Bought another set of Gooby Fleece for the dogs and the quality is not as good as before. I'm extremely sad, since they were my go to fleece suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great sweatshirt for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love Gooby, my 2 dogs have 3 hoodies. I love the D-ring. I wouldnt use it as a harness for one of my dogs that is higher energy, but for my older, calmer dog it is fine. Easy to put on and take off. Great colors. Good length. Measurements are accurate. They get compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: maeghanrose1984

customer_reviews.title: been buying these for years now
customer_reviews.text: I love this collection.. my dog gets cold very easily and needs something extra for the winters. I wash these weekly and the quality, fit and look is great, my dog actually runs up to have me put this on when he sees me take it out of the dryer LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Gooby loves his GOOBY!
customer_reviews.text: My 23lb male Boston Terrier wears an XL and it fits PERFECTLY. He has a beefy chest and typical body. I've washed it a few times and it's still like new, very good quality for the price. He has never worn any clothes before but he doesn't mind this one bit. The hood is also extra cute. It provides moderate warmth, but you'd want their insulated jacket for serious cold. I use both in combination on the really cold day around here (0f).
customer_reviews.author: MAGA

customer_reviews.title: XS great for 2lb puppy
customer_reviews.text: I bought home a tiny puppy - 2lb 4oz - and there were no harnesses that would fit her. I bought this in an extra small and small and the extra small was a perfect size for her little itty bitty-ness. It allowed me to start leash training her almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: V from DC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely size up.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! It is cheap and lightweight material (made in China). I have a Pomeranian so I'm a little worried about overheating him but this light fleece should be no problem indoors and cold temps. You'll have to pull it over and slip the legs into the holes but there is enough opening at the bottom to breathe and pee. I have a 7lb Pomeranian with a somewhat short haircut and a medium fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I have several for my min pin
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have several for my min pin. The only problem is that even though we always order the same size, some are larger than others. It's not by much and they are still wearable but they come down a bit over her tail and she looks like she's shrinking. Other than that, I love love love these. They are affordable, wear pretty well (there is some pilling on the chest of a few that are years old), so soft and cozy and easy to wash and put on. They're great.
customer_reviews.author: obiwan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, sizing tag should be in description.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and warm. The sizing info on the tag would be helpful to have in the description. Bought an XL for my 13 week old, 16lb. Golden retriever puppy. It’s a bit big but she will grow into it soon enough!
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: THESE RUN SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: These run small! We have 2 Boston Terriers. The b/w boy is usually a small but this small is more like an extra small. The material is your average cheap and soft fleece. I can't speak for the quality bc it doesn't fit. We gave these to a friend with smaller dogs than ours and the small was ok for their tiny dogs.
customer_reviews.author: A Major

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Its cozy like a snuggie. Lol. It is slightly hard to put on at first because its snug but she loves it once it's on. Keeps her warm. I like that there are no sleeves so her movement isn't restricted. Penny loves it so she wears it.
customer_reviews.author: forestjad

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Just be aware. The size guidelines they give you on the Amazon page are different than the guidelines that are on the actual product. The measurements are not accurate. I have a small beagle and the Large size barely fit him.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: An amazon must have for your pup.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a few, could've sized down but please read measurements! I ordered a large for my 27 pound terrier and it's a little big, I think a medium would've been perfect. Doesn't shrink in wash or drier!
customer_reviews.author: Billy♡Joji Reese

customer_reviews.title: I would like a matching one...
customer_reviews.text: It's dropping to 12 degrees in the next couple of days and my rescue dog never likes any kind of garment even if she is shivering... She likes this one and I do too. there is no fight getting in or out of the thing and it has plenty of room around the legs; I think most dogs don't care for sleeves... I don't know if I would trust it, but there is even a leash link.. another plus is no velcro; she only tolerates the velcro sound and often avoids it.... whatever issues a rescue dog may come with, this seems to be a great hoodie...
customer_reviews.author: Birdie reviews

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for a bigger dog than it was made for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking XL was for the size of bigger dogs like a yellow lab. I was wrong! It was smaller than I expected but I still tried it on my dog. It stretched easily and I was able to put it on my dog with surprising ease. She stayed warm while it was snowing and had no trouble at all with the fit. All the kids at school gushed at her cuteness in it.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm fleece for my munchkin
customer_reviews.text: I bought my little old cantankerous munchkin a large. It fits great. He’s about 18#, and it’s a little loose, but it’ll do. It seems comfortable and is good to wear around the house when he gets a little chill. It’s a bit tough to get the arms in, but he’s adjust.
customer_reviews.author: km031608

customer_reviews.title: Excellent find, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent find, especially for the price! Ordered a medium for my 18 pound pug; it's quite snug but looks absolutely adorable and is very warm--and the fit makes it so the hood stays on better when it's windy and cold outside to protect her ears. It also has an attachment for your leash on the outside of the jacket on the back, so no need to use a harness with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, very well made! I have never seen such good quality animal apparel for such a reasonable price. We are normally not the type of people to dress up our animals, but one of our cats is a little on the needy side. When he wears his jacket it's like a "hug" and he is so much happier now. The only downside is sometimes the hood gets flipped over his eyes & he can't see lol. Still love it, and also ordered one without the hood to alternate. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie, check size carefully
customer_reviews.text: I love this fleece, it is thick and well made. Read lots of reviews on the size issues. My 10# poodle who normally wears a size small, wears a size medium in this. His chest measures 15 inches.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought it by mistake... I have a big pup and this being fleece he would’ve destroyed it. If you have a small breed and well tamed then I’d recommend this warm hoodie
customer_reviews.author: Johana R

customer_reviews.title: Too small...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my lab/boxer puppy- 3 months old, it didn't fit at all. Got it aroun his neck and that was it. I ordered the medium as the measurements were slightly bigger than his actual size but it was very small. Now he just plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda~*

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is thin. I bought it for my small dog to wear after her haircut and it is not as warm as you'd expect fleece to be and is also not lined with anything. Wearing around the house is okay but would not recommend wearing outside if it's below 45F. The back hook is nice which is why I give 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, not so easy off
customer_reviews.text: Really like it, however very difficult to get off of my Frenchie once on. Putting it on was much easier! Product seems well made, just wish it had a velcro open/close option.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Small and difficult to don on/off
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Quality seemed nice but was difficult to pull over my pups head. I much prefer the ones that Velcro or sip underneath. This was just not a good design for donning on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Conley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wieners warm.
customer_reviews.text: Friggin awesome. Bought two (Medium) for my mini dachshunds, 12 and 10 pounds respectively. They like to be warm in the winter, and actually run over to me when I pick up the sweater and wag their tails as they wait for me to put it on them. Has a tough looking metal ring sewn into the back to attach a leash, and it seems well attached to the fabric. Well enough that a wiener dog couldn't break it anyway. The hood is kinda useless, doesn't stay on except to snap a hilarious picture or two, but who cares. Keeps my dogs warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Scum

customer_reviews.title: 5 star vest
customer_reviews.text: everyone’s reviews helped me a lot so i figured i would leave one too. i was skeptical at first on choosing the right size for my dog since he is a (dachshund) 12 week old puppy, i bought a medium and it works great for keeping him warm and cozy. it’s a little big but he will grow into it quickly. he always gets lots of compliments on his vest and we like that it has the option for attaching the leash to the back. 10/10 recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hammond

customer_reviews.title: These are the best dog hoodies on amazon.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. They fit perfect and look great. Have brought 4 of them different colors for different dogs. All amazing. I've bought other cheaper hoodies that either didn't fit like they were advertised or fell apart after a few washes.. spend the extra $6 or $7 for these its totally worth it. The only critique/ suggestion I would make is if you have male dogs cut apprx 3/4 inch under the hoody so they don't get pee on their hoody as it sometimes runs a little close to their you know what..
customer_reviews.author: TL87

customer_reviews.title: sizes run large
customer_reviews.text: I measured my babies as diagram showed, the Large is TOO large for my 8lb yorkie, the Medium actually fit him better. My other pup is 5.5lbs and the Medium is TOO large for her, even though their chest measurements were at the top end of the size guide diagram. Material seems nice enough, just know the sizes run large.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: since it gets pretty nippy in Ohio
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Boston Terrier as his first hoodie when he was about 10 weeks old, since it gets pretty nippy in Ohio. It was a bit big on him before, but he is now 6.5 months and it fits him really well. He shouldn't grow much more, but Im sure he would still fit fine into the hoodie. I love how it also acts as a harness. Makes it easier for me when I take him for a walk at the park or our occasional pet store runs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: nice fleece quality, it's a little bit difficult to get my dogs arms bent back to make it through the hole. I bought the medium for my 18 lb boston terrier and it's almost too small. really keeps him warm, the hood is adorable, the hood stays where it should be, my dog is NOT bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute hoodie, check your sizing
customer_reviews.text: Cute hoodie. Seems well-made. After reading the reviews, I bought the XL for my 14 pound yorkie-poodle mix. It's very big on her. She'd be better off with a L. Not the fault of the company; just putting this in so people looking for sizing help can take it into account. If your dog is not very big around for its length, you probably don't need to size up, as many suggest. Also, while it's cute, the hood is kind of an annoyance. It's too big to put on my dog (goes completely over her eyes, almost to her mouth), and pulled back it's a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not stretchy
customer_reviews.text: This fleece jacket is really cute once it is on my dog. The trouble is that it is hard to get on and off. There's limited stretch, so my usual pro-jacket pug gets annoyed when getting dressed (She does not with other jackets). Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: User error
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about the sizing and this def only fits small dogs. Anything bigger than a small/ medium terrier will not fit even the biggest size. I blame myself for not taking accurate measurements. Wish they made a size to fit my gigantic Goldendoodle.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Large for my 14lb Pug. It's a little long in the back. I have to readjust it on her. Also being that she's a Pug she sheds. Her fur just sticks to the fleece like crazy. Otherwise it's cute. I don't put it on her as much as I would like because of the shedding. Her fur probably needs a different material so you don't notice the shedding as much.
customer_reviews.author: MsyS23

customer_reviews.title: I love the other “Gooby Every Day Fleece Cold Weather Dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the other “Gooby Every Day Fleece Cold Weather Dog Vest for Small Dogs” but I tried this hooded one in 2 sizes and they both didn’t work for different reasons. One was way small & the other one was too large, as well as the hood was bigger than my dogs body. Wish these had the same fit as the other & a smaller hood.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Cosy
customer_reviews.text: These are great have bought two and we use them all the time. Has bee great for fall or after swimming. I wouldn't trust the d ring over a proper harness but I can fit her harness over this no problem because they fit really well to her body
customer_reviews.author: jennifer carroll

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute!
customer_reviews.text: We got a size small for our 7 lb dachshund puppy and it fits him perfectly! It’s not the thickest but it helps him from shivering. It would be great to go underneath a jacket as well. The spot for the leash is a plus too!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Best dog fleece to use alone or under a dog jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fleece. I have bought 2 so far. So soft, a bit longer than others and well made. Washes well and love hook for the leash. Would highly recommend. Purchased size small for my 10lb jackshund (mini dachshund/Jack Russell).
customer_reviews.author: S. Rotondo

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: We use this multiple times a week during the cold weather on our basenji when we go for walks. He still shivers when it's really cold but he can stay out a lot longer thanks to this sweatshirt. He's long and thin and this fits him perfect without me worrying he's peeing on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft, Keeps Pups Warm
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13 lb chihuahua/rat terrier mix to keep her warm since she stays cold. The material is thick and soft, and it seems to help a lot. The hood is awkward, though, and seems to be just for looks as it falls off her head when walking. Overall, a very good little outfit for your puppies!
customer_reviews.author: Maesen Green

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous (and don't forget to measure your pup)
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! Cozy, warm and soft. These are the only cover ups that my dogs will tolerate for much time. Be careful with sizing. It is no joke that you MUST measure your animal. I have a 7lb chihuahua and 15 lb mix who wear a medium and large, respectively. Good thing I measured! These are designed for small dogs in mind, so think of it more like, "For a small breed, 7lbs is medium" or "For a small breed, 15 lbs is actually kinda large," and you will do fine!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I have a 30-lb pitbull terrier mix. He wears ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30-lb pitbull terrier mix. He wears an XL and this vest fits him perfectly, and it has the hook on the back so I can attach his leash. This is the only clothing item he has that he doesn't try to fight off- he loves it! He's an aggressive puller when we go on walks and this sweater stays securely put.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for our pug!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put this on our pet pug named Skag. I know folks say that you shouldn't put clothes on animals, but our pug loves his so much that he doesn't like it when we take it off to wash it or him. He acts like we've shamed him by taking his clothes off. It's kind of hilarious. We also have a green one so I will probably cross-post this review.
customer_reviews.author: April Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This fleece is perfect! I have a Pug and it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This fleece is perfect! I have a Pug and it is very difficult to find clothes that fit her right. She weighs about 18lbs and I ordered her a Large which fits great! The front leg holes are a little bigger than most shirts/coats and that is just what the more broad shaped dogs need! Definitely recommend this item! She has worn it several times over the last month and I have washed it many times also and the material has held up very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Bryjyt

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOVE  these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and easily slip over your furbaby's head. The best part is the hook on the outside. I don't need to bother with her harness. This is a size Large she is wearing. Fit's great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Sitnick

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but does not fit well on my 7 lb chihuahua. It is hard to get her legs through the leg openings. Unfortunately, the 2nd time she wore it outside she backed up right out of it. I was left with her hoodie on an empty leash.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Runs small for a small. My dogs are 7lbs and its tight. Also runs short for a small. I have pretty standard sized Yorkies, not too big, not too small and its tight and short. Also, not sure if company adjusts the hood size for the actual vest itself. Meaning, is hood the same size for a small or medium? Hood seemed oversized proportionally to the small vest.
customer_reviews.author: Diva girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for Long Skinny Dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my long skinny Boston. Bought a large. He is only 18 lbs. He wears these in the house and under his coat outdoors. Light weight fleece.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: French Bulldog Approved
customer_reviews.text: This fit our 22lb French bulldog, Jelly, to a T. Make sure to read the sizing chart. We normally order her mediums, but went with a large and it was perfect. Soft, durable, easy to put on, and generous sized hood to cover her big frenchie ears!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Comfotable !
customer_reviews.text: We followed the sizing chart and ordered an extra large for our 18 pound Boston terrier. It was a little loose around the middle. It hung down enough that he could urinate into it. I took the side seams apart, took out a few inches and resewed them. It fits him perfectly now and we can leave it on him when he needs to go to the bathroom. It is very high quality and he seems extremely comfortable wearing it. He loves it so much that he sticks his head in on his own. Perfect to take the chill off after a bath !
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well, is super soft and cozy, and the color is great. Unfortunately, even with measuring my dog, the vest is hard to get on her, and borders on too snug. I say move up a size if ordering.
customer_reviews.author: DED

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: First off let me just say that my dog loves this. He doesn’t like it when he hast to take it off so I would definitely call this a win.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

product_meta.title: Gooby - Fleece Vest Hoodie, Small Dog Pull Over Hooded Fleece Jacket with Leash Ring
product_meta.description: Size:Small chest (~10.5")| Color:PlumFleece Vest Hoodie is for Small Dogs. Measure the largest part of the dog's chest and make sure the neck opening is bigger than dog's head. Follow the chest size and if between sizes, please size up.
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR SMALL DOG WARM ALL WINTER LONG - When the cold weather hits, make sure your small dog isn’t shivering and stays warm with the soft and comfortable Gooby Fleece Vest Hoodie. Made with 100% polyester to keep moisture out like freezing rain or snow, and to help keep warm air in, so your dog always stays warm. This small fleece dog vest hoodie is safe, durable, and made to last.

EASY-ON. EASY-OFF. - Imagine this - Outside it’s snowing and freezing and your dog HAS to go. Our Fleece Dog Vest Hoodie is a pullover that you can quickly and easily put on your dog and head outside - no spending minutes struggling to put it on. It doesn’t require any velcro or zippers to keep secure, so when there’s an emergency, this hassle-free small dog fleece slips on and off with ease.

STYLE MEETS FUNCTION - This isn’t your typical small dog sweater or dog jacket. Choose from many different colors to make sure your small dog is the warmest and coolest dog on the block. It’s designed with armholes big enough for your dog to comfortably walk and go to the bathroom. Plus, it features an O-ring on the back to use for short winter walks. (not recommended if your dog pulls.)

EASY TO CLEAN - During the winter, the cold weather means your dog’s winter clothes are exposed to salt, snow, and all that gross sidewalk slush. That’s why we made the dog fleece vest hoodie machine-washable to remove any dirt easily. No hand-washing or worrying about the fleece getting ruined after one walk. Throw it in the washer and dryer, and it’s good to go for your next winter adventure.

SIZING MADE FOR SMALL DOGS - Please note that our Fleece Vest is made for small dogs. Size large will most likely fit a dog up to 35 lbs. When choosing the correct size, simply measure your dog's chest size with a tape measure and follow the chest measurement first and foremost. We also recommend choosing a neck opening that is bigger than the size of your dog’s head for accurate fitting.

specifications.Manufacturer: Inafiction USA, Inc. dba Gooby Pet Fashion
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
